trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expone los tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> a la automatización de la interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: El elemento asociado a este nivel de automatización.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Minimizes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Minimiza el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este método establece la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> propiedad `true`.

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto ubicado en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> que se asocia a este elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Crea un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> para el elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> asociado al elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Restaura el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este método establece la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> propiedad `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el estado, expandido o contraído, del control asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Estado del control asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el tipo de control correspondiente al control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: El valor de enumeración <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de elementos secundarios del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Elementos secundarios de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> que se asocia a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> method returns a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objects that represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> método devuelve una colección de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objetos que representan el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objetos que pertenecen a la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> asociado a esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de tipo del elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> asociado.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumeración de valor que especifica el patrón de control.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el patrón de control de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> que está asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is <see langword="false" /> and <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> es <see langword="false" /> y <paramref name="patternInterface" /> tiene el valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, este método devuelve un objeto que admite el patrón de control; de lo contrario, es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> está fuera de la pantalla.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> está contraído; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Esta API no está implementada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que especifica si el elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> permite que se seleccione más de un elemento secundario al mismo tiempo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> en todos los casos.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que especifica si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> requiere que se seleccione al menos un elemento secundario.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> en todos los casos.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.
